snippet: The region, known for deserts, high temperatures and oil, has begun to embrace the sport, but the strides are still tentative.
lead_paragraph: The region, known for deserts, high temperatures and oil, has begun to embrace the sport, but the strides are still tentative.

headline.seo: Persian Gulf Nations Are Coming Around to Ice Hockey
headline.main: Slowly, Persian Gulf Nations Come Around to Ice Hockey
headline.print_headline: Slowly, Some Persian Gulf Nations Come Around to Unlikely Sport
